{{cpp/title|decay}}
{{cpp/meta/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|type_traits}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
struct decay;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Performs the type conversions equivalent to the ones performed when passing [[cpp/language/function#Parameter list|function arguments]] by value. Formally:

* If {{tt|T}} is "array of {{tt|U}}" or reference to it, the member typedef {{tt|type}} is {{tt|U*}}.

* Otherwise, if {{tt|T}} is a function type {{tt|F}} or reference to one, the member typedef {{tt|type}} is {{c/core|std::add_pointer&lt;F&gt;::type}}.

* Otherwise, the member typedef {{tt|type}} is {{c/core|std::remove_cv&lt;std::remove_reference&lt;T&gt;::type&gt;::type}}.

{{cpp/types/nospec}}

===Member types===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem|Name|Definition}}
{{dsc|{{tt|type}}|the result of applying the decay type conversions to {{tt|T}}}}
{{dsc end}}

===Helper types===
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++14|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
using decay_t = typename decay&lt;T&gt;::type;
}}
{{dcl end}}

===Possible implementation===
{{eq fun|1=
template&lt;class T&gt;
struct decay
{
private:
    typedef typename std::remove_reference&lt;T&gt;::type U;
public:
    typedef typename std::conditional&lt; 
        std::is_array&lt;U&gt;::value,
        typename std::add_pointer&lt;typename std::remove_extent&lt;U&gt;::type&gt;::type,
        typename std::conditional&lt; 
            std::is_function&lt;U&gt;::value,
            typename std::add_pointer&lt;U&gt;::type,
            typename std::remove_cv&lt;U&gt;::type
        &gt;::type
    &gt;::type type;
};
}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;type_traits&gt;

template&lt;typename T, typename U&gt;
constexpr bool is_decay_equ = std::is_same_v&lt;std::decay_t&lt;T&gt;, U&gt;;

int main()
{
    static_assert
    (
        is_decay_equ&lt;int, int&gt; &amp;&amp;
        ! is_decay_equ&lt;int, float&gt; &amp;&amp;
        is_decay_equ&lt;int&amp;, int&gt; &amp;&amp;
        is_decay_equ&lt;int&amp;&amp;, int&gt; &amp;&amp;
        is_decay_equ&lt;const int&amp;, int&gt; &amp;&amp;
        is_decay_equ&lt;int[2], int*&gt; &amp;&amp;
        ! is_decay_equ&lt;int[4][2], int*&gt; &amp;&amp;
        ! is_decay_equ&lt;int[4][2], int**&gt; &amp;&amp;
        is_decay_equ&lt;int[4][2], int(*)[2]&gt; &amp;&amp;
        is_decay_equ&lt;int(int), int(*)(int)&gt;
    );
}
}}
